mapper.select: SELECT k.ano,atitle,k.pno,p.mnick,k.lname,adate,ahit FROM (SELECT ano,atitle,aplc.pno,l.lname,adate,ahit from (SELECT ano,atitle,lc.lno,ap.pno,lc.lqno,adate,ahit FROM (SELECT askboard.pno,ano, problem.lqno, atitle, adate, ahit FROM askboard JOIN problem ON askboard.pno=problem.pno) ap JOIN licenseClass lc ON ap.lqno=lc.lqno) aplc JOIN license l ON aplc.lno=l.lno)k join (SELECT ano, a.mno, m.mnick from askboard a JOIN member m ON a.mno=m.mno) p ON p.ano=k.ano where atitle like '%${search}%' ORDER BY k.ano desc LIMIT #{start}, #{size}

SELECT k.ano,atitle,k.pno,p.mnick,k.lname,adate,ahit FROM (SELECT ano,atitle,aplc.pno,l.lname,adate,ahit from (SELECT ano,atitle,lc.lno,ap.pno,lc.lqno,adate,ahit FROM (SELECT askboard.pno,ano, problem.lqno, atitle, adate, ahit FROM askboard JOIN problem ON askboard.pno=problem.pno) ap JOIN licenseClass lc ON ap.lqno=lc.lqno) aplc JOIN license l ON aplc.lno=l.lno)k join (SELECT ano, a.mno, m.mnick from askboard a JOIN member m ON a.mno=m.mno) p ON p.ano=k.ano ORDER BY k.ano desc LIMIT #{start}, #{size}
select acno,mnick,accontent, acdate,acdepth from askcoment a join member m on a.mno=m.mno where ano=#{ano} order by if(isnull(acparent),acno,acparent),acorder
mapper.insert: insert into askcoment(ano,mno,accontent,acparent,acdepth,acorder) values(#{ano},#{mno},#{accontent},#{acparent},#{acdepth},(select acorder from askcoment a where acno=#{acparent} order by acno desc limit 1)+1)
mapper.delete: delete from askcoment where acno=#{acno} or acparent=#{acno}
